name: number
description: Input field for numbers with +/- buttons to increment/decrement operations

fields.data:
Number field properties:
⦿help - explain input pattern and purpose. can be displayed on ❔ button click
⦿default - value on initial display
⦿readonly - disable input from the user
⦿required - when set to ture, input must be provided (empty string is not allowed) 
⦿restrictions - provide min or/and max values to restrict user input 
⦿step - provide The increment the value will increase/decrease when the +/- buttons are pressed
fields.name: info_msg_number_options

fields.help: Click the +/- buttons to increment/decrement respectively or enter the required value in the input field. field value should be between 10 and 80 with default step value 1 because step not set
fields.name: number_with_restrictions

fields.help: Click the +/- buttons to increment/decrement respectively or enter the required value in the input field. field value should be between 0 and 1 with step 0.1
fields.name: number_with_step

fields.help: Click the +/- buttons to increment/decrement respectively or enter the required value in the input field. value can be empty
fields.name: not_required_number

fields.help: Click the +/- buttons to increment/decrement respectively or enter the required value in the input field. value must not be empty
fields.name: required_number

fields.help: Read Only Number is a preseted readonly field with the value of 35. for readonly input field it is preferdable to use text fields, for more information see input fields example
fields.name: read_only_number
number_json
fields.default:
{
  "default": 10,
  "display": "Number with restrictions",
  "help": "Click the +/- buttons to increment/decrement respectively or enter the required value in the input field. field value should be between 10 and 80",
  "name": "number_with_restrictions",
  "required": true,
  "restrictions": {
    "min": 10,
    "max": 80
  },
  "type": "number"
},

  "default": 0.0,
  "display": "Number with step",
  "help": "Click the +/- buttons to increment/decrement respectively or enter the required value in the input field. field value should be between 0 and 1 with step 0.1",
  "name": "number_with_step",
  "required": true,
  "restrictions": {
    "min": 0.0,
    "max": 1
  },,
  "step": 0.1
  "type": "number"
},
{
  "display": "Not required Number",
  "help": "Click the +/- buttons to increment/decrement respectively or enter the required value in the input field. value can be empty",
  "name": "not_required_number",
  "required": false,
  "type": "number"
},
{
  "display": "Required Number",
  "help": "Click the +/- buttons to increment/decrement respectively or enter the required value in the input field. value must not be empty",
  "name": "required_number",
  "required": true,
  "type": "number"
},
{
  "default": 35,
  "display": "Read Only Number",
  "help": "Read Only Number is a preseted readonly field with the value of 35. for readonly input field it is preferdable to use text fields, for more information see input fields example",
  "name": "read_only_number",
  "required": true,
  "readonly": true,
  "type": "number"
}
